Windlord:

"I don't sure that would goon idea, Grounded, I think that Recon and 
the lizard-fire-laucher are around... Plus Virgo said that something 
strange landed and I don't like see TRinity injured"


"I'm a fierce Pred, heard" said TRinity, using computer's comm link 
and she roared like a little kitty "You seee!!???"


"Well Fierce Pred.."replied Windlord "I  have a duty to you: YOu will 
keep an eye in front of Door if you see something strange you will go 
to tell to Grounded about that... You have an important job; Trinity, 
You'll advice Grounded every danger outside base..."


"YIPPPPPYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!1 YAHOOOOOOOOO"  said happily Trinity "I have 
other important job!!!!!"

Trinity ran outside base and she was watching around ready to Protect 
the base.

"Grounded, can you look after the child?" begged Windlord
